mapper.sql: logid, change_id, queue_id, corp_id, corp_name, order_id, login_id, login_name, oper_action, oper_time, cont, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM as_notice_queue_log WHERE 1=1 AND (queue_id = #{queue_id} OR queue_id LIKE '%'||#{queue_id}||'%') '%'+#{queue_id}+'%') CONCAT('%', #{queue_id}, '%')) ORDER BY oper_time DESC ,create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_notice_queue_log( logid, change_id, queue_id, corp_id, corp_name, order_id, login_id, login_name, oper_action, oper_time, cont, create_time ) VALUES( #{logid}, #{change_id}, #{queue_id}, #{corp_id}, #{corp_name}, #{order_id}, #{login_id}, #{login_name}, #{oper_action}, #{oper_time}, #{cont}, #{create_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE as_notice_queue_log SET logid = #{logid}, change_id = #{change_id}, queue_id = #{queue_id}, corp_id = #{corp_id}, corp_name = #{corp_name}, order_id = #{order_id}, login_id = #{login_id}, login_name = #{login_name}, oper_action = #{oper_action}, oper_time = #{oper_time}, cont = #{cont}, create_time = #{create_time} WHERE logid = #{logid}
